Title: Get Back Here!
Description:
Oh, before I forget, I have something I was asked to deliver to you. A letter from one of your companions, I assume.

I was made to understand that your presence was urgently required, so I took the liberty of arranging your passage.

Speak to Ginsa Arroweye just south of here when you're ready. She has a kite waiting.
ObjectivesText: Report to Admiral Taylor in Pearlfin Village.
PortraitTurnInText: Admiral Taylor is awaiting your return.
RewardText: Welcome back, $n. I trust your journey has been insightful, particularly in regards to the layout of the land. There is still much to do before we march into battle.
